title: Did you tell Star the truth, Bethany Frankel, about Megan Markle?
subtitle: The Star of Real Housewives in New York tweeted hours before Oprah Winfrey's interview with Harry and Megan was broadcast.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On the morning of March 7, 2012, hours before CBS aired an interview with Prince Harry, and Megan Markle, the star of reality television Bettney Frankel used Twitter to mock the sympathy of the Duchess of Sussex.
